media:group.media:description: [ESP] ﾂｿQuieres oﾃｭr hablar sobre un tema actual sobre el medio ambiente y practicar tu comprensiﾃｳn auditiva en espaﾃｱol? ﾂ｡Te animamos a hacerlo! [ENG] Want to hear about a current topic about the environment and practice your listening comprehension in Spanish? We encourage you to do it! 沽

entry.title: SPANISH LISTENING B1: What animal would you like to be?

media:group.media:title: SPANISH LISTENING B1: What animal would you like to be?
media:group.media:description:

[ENG] Do you want to hear a story and practice your listening comprehension in Spanish? Do it, it's a lot of fun! Do not forget to leave a comment if you liked it.

entry.title: SPANISH LISTENING B2: El bosque encantado

media:group.media:title: SPANISH LISTENING B2: El bosque encantado
media:group.media:description:

ﾂ｡No olvidﾃｩis verlo hasta el final para responder a las preguntas!

media:group.media:title: SPANISH C1: 7 Maravillas del Mundo Moderno
media:group.media:description: [ESP] ﾂｿSabes cuﾃ｡les son las 7 Maravillas de Mundo Moderno? Si no lo sabes, ﾂ｡no te pierdas este corto e informativo vﾃｭdeo! [ENG] What are the 7 Wonders of the Modern World? If you don't know, do not miss this short and informative video.

entry.title: SPANISH C1: Entrevistamos a un piloto de aviﾃｳn en el aeropuerto de Cuatro Vientos (Madrid, Espaﾃｱa)

media:group.media:title: SPANISH C1: Entrevistamos a un piloto de aviﾃｳn en el aeropuerto de Cuatro Vientos (Madrid, Espaﾃｱa)
media:group.media:description:
#spanish #c1 #linguahispana #espaﾃｱolonline #spanishonline #spanishclasses #clasesdeespaﾃｱol #spanishfree #espaﾃｱolgratis #entrevista #interview #pilot #airplane #airplanepilot #fly #flighinstructor #founder #FlyFun #juliozavala #aeropuerto #cuatrovientos #airport #spanishincontext #espaﾃｱolencontexto #reportaje #reportage
[ESP] Ser piloto de aviﾃｳn es una de las profesiones mﾃ｡s interesantes del mundo, ﾂｿno te parece? ﾂｿTienes curiosidad sobre quﾃｩ sintiﾃｳ uno de ellos el primer dﾃｭa que tuvo que pilotar un aviﾃｳn ﾃｩl solo?
ﾂ｡No te pierdas este vﾃｭdeo! Encontrarﾃ｡s respuesta a estas preguntas y a muchas mﾃ｡s, ademﾃ｡s de (por supuesto) practicar tu listening en espaﾃｱol.
Gracias a Julio Zavala, piloto, instructor de vuelo y fundador de la escuela de aeronaﾃｺtica Fly&Fun por esta entrevista.
[ENG] Being an airplane pilot is one of the most interesting professions in the world, don't you agree?
Are you curious about how one of them felt the first day he had to fly a plane on his own?
Don't miss out on this video! You will find answers to these questions and many more, in addition to (of course) practicing your listening in Spanish.
Thank you Julio Zavala, pilot, flight instructor and founder of the Fly&Fun airschool for this interview.

media:group.media:title: SPANISH B1: Interrogatives When & Where
media:group.media:description: [ESP] En el vﾃｭdeo de hoy vamos a ver los interrogativos "dﾃｳnde" y "cuﾃ｡ndo". [ENG] In today's video we will see the interrogatives "where" and "when".

media:group.media:title: SPANISH B1: Interrogatives Which one (s)

media:group.media:title: SPANISH A2: Frequency Adverbs
media:group.media:description:
[ESP] En el vﾃｭdeo de hoy vamos a hablar sobre adverbios de frecuencia. Son muy ﾃｺtiles para mantener una conversaciﾃｳn en espaﾃｱol, ﾂｿverdad? 沽
[ENG] In todayﾂｴs video we are going to talk about frequency adverbs. They are very useful for having a conversation in Spanish, is it true? 沽
#frequencyadverbs #adverbiosdefrecuencia #freeSpanish #freeSpanishclasses

media:group.media:title: SPANISH A2: Habits
media:group.media:description:
#habits #habitos #aprendespaﾃｱol #learnspanish
[ESP] Aprende algunos hﾃ｡bitos cotidianos con este entretenido y simpﾃ｡tico vﾃｭdeo. ﾂｿCuﾃ｡l te gusta mﾃ｡s? :)
[ENG] Learn some daily habits with this entretaining and funny video. Which one do you like the most? :)

entry.title: Visitamos un supermercado en Espaﾃｱa | We visit a Spanish supermarket! 泝

media:group.media:title: Visitamos un supermercado en Espaﾃｱa | We visit a Spanish supermarket! 泝
media:group.media:description:
[ESP] Cuando vengas a Espaﾃｱa y tengas que hacer la compra, te va a ser muy ﾃｺtil acordarte de las palabras de vocabulario que te enseﾃｱamos en este vﾃｭdeo, dentro del supermercado. ﾂ｡No te lo pierdas!
ﾂ[ENG] When you arrive in Spain and you have to go shopping, this video will be most useful for you (remember the vocabulary words that we teach you, inside the supermarket). Do not miss it!
#supermercadoespaﾃｱa #supermercadoespaﾃｱol #vocabularioespaﾃｱol #vocabulario #alimentos #linguahispana

media:group.media:title: SPANISH B2: Gerund
media:group.media:description:
[ESP] En el vﾃｭdeo de hoy vamos a aprender quﾃｩ es el gerundio y cﾃｳmo se utiliza. El gerundio en espaﾃｱol es mﾃ｡s difﾃｭcil que en inglﾃｩs, ﾂ｡averigua por quﾃｩ!
[ENG] In todayﾂｴs video we are going to learn what the gerund is and how it is used. The gerund tense in Spanish is more difficult than in English, find out why!

media:group.media:title: SPANISH A2: Also vs Neither
media:group.media:description: [ESP] En este vﾃｭdeo vamos a aprender la diferencia entre "tambiﾃｩn" y "tampoco"; son palabras muy similares pero se usan para expresar cosas diferentes. [ENG] In this video we are going to learn the difference between "also" and "neither"; they are very similar words but they are used to express different things.

media:group.media:title: SPANISH B2: Idioms (part 5)
media:group.media:description:
[ESP]ﾂｿSabes lo que son las expresiones idiomﾃ｡ticas? ﾂ｡Aprﾃｩndelas en el quinto video de esta serie!
[ENG] Do you know what idioms are? Learn them in the fifth video of this series!
